New Records: Ireland hosted Pakistan in a T20I match for the first time
Andrew Balbirnie and Harry Tector formed a 77-run partnership
George Dockrell scored 24 runs on 12 balls
Key Match Events: Ireland's batsmen staged a comeback after a poor start
Balbirnie was dismissed for 38 runs but Ireland managed to chase down the target
Shaheen Afridi and other Pakistan bowlers took key wickets
Pre-Game Insights: This was the first T20I match between Ireland and Pakistan in Ireland
Pakistan batted first with Babar Azam and Saim Ayub forming a crucial 85-run partnership
Post-Match Reflections: Ireland's win was historic and significant for their cricket team
Pakistan's batting and bowling performance was critiqued post-match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of a three-match series
The attendance at the MCG for India vs Australia was noted separately
